title: manzoor hyd
author: manzoor hyd
content: Tether has announced the launch of its USDT stablecoin on the Polygon (MATIC) blockchain, taking the total number of USDT-supported networks to 11. Tether says the launch of USDT on Polygon will usher in significant cost savings for decentralized finance (DeFi) market participants in the Polygon ecosystem.
